outputs.output_descr: The project will facilitate the rehabilitation of a waste disposal site and bring the informal scavenger sector into the formal waste management sector which will result in  in reduced UPOPs emissions from two sources: open burning of collected waste and open burning of uncollected waste.
outputs.output_title: Less Burnt for A Clean Earth

project_descr: Project's incremental strategy is to organize and bring the informal waste sector into the formal waste management to achieve reduction in UPOPs emissions from two sources: open burning of collected waste and open burning of uncollected waste.
project_title: 4221: Less Burnt for A Clean Earth (FSP)
